uk.co.visalia.brightpearl.apiclient.search

Class SearchResultsMetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.visalia.brightpearl.apiclient.search.SearchResultsMetaData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class SearchResultsMetaData
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Contains the metadata of a response from a search resource, describing which search columns were returned, the sort order applied, and the number of available results. http://brightpearl.com/developer/latest/tutorial/working-with-resource-search.html
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SearchResultsMetaData() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<SearchColumn> getColumns()
      The columns included in the response.
      Integer getFirstResult()
      Returns the position of the first result on the current page.
      Integer getLastResult()
      Returns the position of the last result on the current page.
      Integer getResultsAvailable()
      Returns the total number of results that matched the filters supplied.
      Integer getResultsReturned()
      Returns the number of results included on the current page.
      List<SearchSort> getSorting()
      The sorting applied to the results.
